runs.comm: swings it into the pads from back of length, Chamu can't get bat on that
nicely square-driven off the back foot but can't clear point. Was short of length again, this time outside off
quick and risky single, but mid-on can't pick it up. Chibhabha pushed the straight and swinging ball to the leg side and was scampering for the run, and was helped by the fielder
covers his stumps, and gets the ball behind square off a thick inside edge after the ball swings in
beautiful delivery - outswing for the nearly length ball outside off, Masakadza pokes and misses
short ball is pulled handsomely to the leg side, but there's protection there
shuffles down and pushes into the covers with the turn
Hamza bowls from wide of the crease, Masakadza dances down this time and slogs it down to long-on. Didn't middle it
similar shot from Chibhabha, comes down the track and somewhat mistimes the heave to long-on
flicked in the air, but lands safe! He came down and chipped that one with the angle to the leg side, it went pretty high, but fell wide of deep square leg
loud appeal for lbw even though that struck his front pad well outside off, as he tried to sweep. They sneak in a leg bye
that's gone very very high on the leg side, it was a top-edge and Karim Sadiq misjudged it! Chibhabha didn't time it properly after coming down, KArim chased from mid-on but barely got hands to it

Dropped and out next ball! Banged in short and hurries onto the batsman. He does not control the hook. Gets a top edge that settles into the hands of Nabi. He runs to his right from midwicket and catches it near square leg. Dawlat celebrates by blowing kisses
length ball outside off, lofted over mid-on. Usman chases hard and pulls the ball in
Hamilton jumps down the track, Dawlat hurls a bumper with extra shoulder. Hooks and misses. The keeper can't collect the ball either. It may have lobbed over off the glove. Not sure
follows up the bouncer with a 110ks slower ball, hits the pad and pops into the off side
short and outside off, steered to third man
back of a length and on off, hoisted over midwicket
hurrying ball on off, chopped to point
MS fumbles, but stumps 'em on the rebound! It's MS's night in Sharjah. The batsman steps out, Hamza is wary of it as he shortens his length. This one arrows in with the angle, beats the batsman

two in two for Hamza! The finger goes up. Arm-ball, snakes in sharply  and raps the pad in front of off. It was too quick for Waller to chop it away square. Quite a threat to chop from the stumps as well
dug in short, cut from the stumps, finds cover and averts the hat-trick
drifts in and turns away, poked to point
skiddy ball on middle, punchily played to cover
slings an off-side wide. Did that slip out of the hand?
and again! Far too wide outside off. Not an auspicious start for the left-arm pacer
he gets his radar right now. Full and ducks back in, Hamilton manages an inside edge onto the pad
length ball outside off, Hamilton drops onto one knee, and sweeps it over backward square leg
Hamilton runs down the track and flat-bat wallops it down the ground, forcing the bowler and the umpire to take evasive action
short and outside off, slapped in the gap at midwicket and mid-on
pitched up on middle, drop-and-run single in front of cover
back of a length as Shirzad brings this one in on middle and off, chopped down to third man
lovely offbreak, grips in the surface, MS effects another stumping. This is a simpler one. Raza shows his ace early as he dances out, Nabi held this back. MS does the rest
looped up on off, poked behind square on off

tossed up, spins in to take the pad and squirts towards backward point. Chigumbura sets off but is sent back. There was no single there. He is short of the crease, despite a desperate dive. Ghani swoops low and throws it to MS. He is everywhere! Zimbabwe are rattled
flat and quicker now, punched to midwicket
turn and bounce, catches the pad, the bounces off the batsman's helmet, kisses the thigh, and hits the leg stump. But the bails refuse to budge
113.4ks, slower ball angled across, beats the outside edge
back of a length and slanted across off, late dab and a miss
pitched up outside off, check-driven to mid-off
another one whistles past the outside edge. Full ball, Moor drives loosely and does not lay bat onto it
slower ball, floated wide outside off
short ball on off, Moor is up on his tippy toes as he works a single to square leg
straight in line, turned behind the square leg umpire
down the track, and quietly tapped to long-on
half-tracker, turning into the leg stump. Moor rocks back and pummels a pull over square leg, pinging the roof. The ball is lost!
dug in short, chopped past the off stump behind the wicket
tossed up offbreak, Hamilton dances out and clips behind square on leg
skids off the surface on middle, poked towards square leg
fuller length and angling away, patted to cover
full and outside off, cracked to deep cover
full and angled away outside off, Hamilton throws his bat at it and sends it over short third man off a thick outside edge
slower bouncer, leaps to the keeper. Ducked under
Hamilton nudges this off-stump ball towards cover
dragged to deep midwicket off the inside half
dropped short, looks like a googly. Swatted down the ground
slides on, swept to deep square leg from off stump
non-turning ball, punched into the covers off the back foot
googly, spins in, Hamilton skips out. Does not read it, diverts it fine off the pad
darted short again, punched back to Rashid
drooped short and outside off, cut to deep cover for one
back of a length and outside off, Moor frees his arms and cuts it firmly to deep point, sweeper runs to his left and is nutmegged. Lazy effort
shortish slower ball, lap-pulled away behind square. Moor wants two, there is some miscommunication between the wickets. Hamilton, though, drifts back, slides his bat in time
yorker outside off, he makes room and slashes to cover. Smart diving stop
width outside off, Moor allows the ball to come to him and cuts it past backward point
dug in short and outside off. Slower ball, sat up to be hit. Smacked over deep midwicket with a pull
pitched up and outside off, Moor brings his carving knife and slices it over backward point
Moor skips back and punches to deep cover
tossed up googly, sweep and a miss, takes it on the pad
another googly, turns in. Hamilton skips out, does not get close to the pitch, and is hit on the pad
skiddy ball, slides on outside off, Moor can't cut it away. Beaten
shoots low and turns in outside the leg stump
more flight outside off, sliced over to sweeper cover
short ball on off, half-flicked and half-pulled to midwicket
length ball on off, swung away to long-on
yorker outside off, Moor can't dig it out
back of a length, slower at 100ks, punched out to deep cover
pitched up and width outside off, Hamilton goes down on one knee and lifts it over the covers
blockhole ball on off, Moor jabs his bat down hurriedly, squirts it to long-off
down the track and belted to long-off
fired in on off, forced to long-off again
leg-stump short ball, pulled over cow corner with terrific power
loopy, turning ball, check-driven to long-off
darted short, skiddy ball, punched back
chopped from off stump to point
drifting down leg, brushes the pad on its way to the keeper
fractionally short on middle, Hamilton launches it out of the ground with a monster pull. Smashed over midwicket, he acknowledges his fifty
full and straight, picked up and dispatched over cow corner. He sends it soaring out of the ground, again
slower back of a length ball, turned gently past midwicket
Moor jumps outside leg, Dawlat bowls it further wide outside off. Leg-breakish slower ball. Moor reaches out and slices to deep point. Ghani runs in and snaps it up. Dawlat and Nelson strike
slower ball, tucked off the pads through square leg
dug in short, mis-hit pull to deep square
slogged from outside off to long-on
slog-sweep and a miss outside off against a legbreak
slog-sweep and a miss again! Rashid nails the off stump now! Fired straight on off. Hamilton goes across the line and does not connect. He has added some respectability to the chase, though
flat and full, whipped through midwicket
reverse-swept four wide of backward point. Zimbabwe cross MS's 118
whipped off the hips to deep midwicket
And Jonge falls! Full and pushed across off, he looks to go over cover. He does not get the required timing, and plops a catch to the captain at cover! Dolly catch
down the track and weakly driven past the bowler to mid-off
floaty full toss, flashed to cover
leg-side wide
banged in short, pulled behind square
full and angling away outside off, Cremer targets the leg side with a swipe. He makes a mess of it and skewers it to cover. Ghani calls for it and takes it
quick googly, inside-edged to short fine leg
MS belts out an appeal for caught behind not given. Googly outside off, slog and a miss
slides on middle, reverse lapped to short third man
another slog and a miss outside off
low full toss on middle, reverse-slapped away past backward point
dropped short on middle, pulled towards deep midwicket

Afghanistan thump Zimbabwe and take the series 2-0! They add the T20 trophy to the ODI trophy. Slid on middle, Tiripano edges an attempted reverse-sweep to short third man. They go for the second via an overthrow, the fielder (Naib) throws the stumps down at the bowler's end. Chisoro is too lazy, he does not bother to ground his bat. He did not get his foot down either
